PropertyDef.Name: Heavy turret
PropertyDef.Description: Left up corner of turrent, insta-kill when when player collides

PropertyDef.Name: Lizard
PropertyDef.Description: Almost harmless, killed when collides with player (which takes very little damage)

PropertyDef.Name: Working generator
PropertyDef.Description: Top left corner of working generator animation

PropertyDef.Name: Down left obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor up direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Top left obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor down direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Up right obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor in down direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Down right obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor in up direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 1
PropertyDef.Description: This will show message from smart card 1

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 2
PropertyDef.Description: This will show message from smart card 2

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 3
PropertyDef.Description: This will show message from smart card 3

PropertyDef.Name: Special door 1
PropertyDef.Description: Door opened with special key card 1

PropertyDef.Name: Special door 2
PropertyDef.Description: Door opened with special key card 2

PropertyDef.Name: Local teleport (end)
PropertyDef.Description: Teleports player to this location, the one that is furthest

PropertyDef.Name: Obstacle(for enemies only)
PropertyDef.Description: Player can walk trough it, movable enemies can't

PropertyDef.Name: Generator (activate switch)
PropertyDef.Description: Activates generator when player stomps on it

PropertyDef.Name: Obstacle(except projectiles)
PropertyDef.Description: Collision, but weapon projectile can penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Door
PropertyDef.Description: Door with normal key card required

PropertyDef.Name: One way gate (Up)
PropertyDef.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in up direction, other way insta-kills player

PropertyDef.Name: One way gate (Down)
PropertyDef.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in down direction, other way insta-kills player

PropertyDef.Name: One way gate (Right)
PropertyDef.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in right direction, other way insta-kills player

PropertyDef.Name: One way gate (Left)
PropertyDef.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in left direction, other way insta-kills player

PropertyDef.Name: Directed gun (Right)
PropertyDef.Description: Gun directed to right, deals great damage to player

PropertyDef.Name: Directed gun (Up)
PropertyDef.Description: Gun directed to up, deals great damage to player

PropertyDef.Name: Down left obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor up direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Top left obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor down direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Up right obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor in down direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Down right obstacle (for all)
PropertyDef.Description: Slightly pushes actor in up direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 1
PropertyDef.Description: This will show note message from smart card 1

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 2
PropertyDef.Description: This will show note message from smart card 2

PropertyDef.Name: Smart card 3
PropertyDef.Description: This will show note message from smart card 3

PropertyDef.Name: Monster spawner
PropertyDef.Description: Creates a hole where monsters are comming from

PropertyDef.Name: Local teleport (end)
PropertyDef.Description: Teleports player to this location, the one that is furthest

PropertyDef.Name: Radioactive area
PropertyDef.Description: Radioactive area that hurts player if standing on it

PropertyDef.Name: Obstacle(for enemies only)
PropertyDef.Description: Player can walk trough it, movable enemies can't

PropertyDef.Name: Obstacle(except projectiles)
PropertyDef.Description: Collision, but weapon projectile can penetrate

PropertyDef.Name: Door
PropertyDef.Description: Door with no color card required
